Technique: BURNED, OXIDIZED; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Globular bottle
Description: Globular bottle with narrow mouth, rounded rim, short neck and somewhat unstable and convex base. Reddish-coloured paste and surface with almost complete coating, also reddish in colour. A painted decoration in the colours off-white and wine-red, on the basis of bands of different width, encircles the piece.
